EmailTemplate.description: Without markers, this message appears less system-generated, and can be used to inform the customer that there is a new comment on the case. The text template contains instruction to reply by responding directly to the email. Includes the 25 most recent public comments, Case Number, Status, Priority Level, Subject, and Description.
EmailTemplate.name: New Comment w/o Markers (text)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.E2CP__Case_Thread_Id__c}
